Uses of Class
com.example.hbaltz.aton.rajawali.DeviceExtrinsics

  • Packages that use DeviceExtrinsics 
    Package Description
    com.example.hbaltz.aton.rajawali
    Rajawali-specific code shared by the different samples.

    • Uses of DeviceExtrinsics in com.example.hbaltz.aton.rajawali

      Methods in com.example.hbaltz.aton.rajawali with parameters of type DeviceExtrinsics 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static com.google.atap.tangoservice.TangoPoseData ScenePoseCalculator.planeFitToTangoWorldPose(double[] point, double[] normal, com.google.atap.tangoservice.TangoPoseData tangoPose, DeviceExtrinsics extrinsics)
      Given a point and a normal in depth camera frame and the device pose in start of service frame at the time the point and normal were acquired, calculate a Pose object which represents the position and orientation of the fitted plane with its Y vector pointing up in the gravity vector, represented in the Tango start of service frame.
      static Pose ScenePoseCalculator.toDepthCameraOpenGlPose(com.google.atap.tangoservice.TangoPoseData devicePose, DeviceExtrinsics extrinsics)
      Given the device pose in start of service frame, calculate the position and orientation of the depth sensor in OpenGL coordinate frame.
      static Pose ScenePoseCalculator.toOpenGlCameraPose(com.google.atap.tangoservice.TangoPoseData devicePose, DeviceExtrinsics extrinsics)
      Given the device pose in start of service frame, calculate the corresponding position and orientation for a OpenGL Scene Camera in the Rajawali world.
